        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>40d0158c-b92c-43f3-25fa-7a85556ea3d8#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Giotto: Szent Ferenc prédikációja a madaraknak</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto: Saint Francis's sermon to the birds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto: Heiliger Franciss Predigt zu den 
Vögeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto : Sermon de Saint Francis aux 
oiseaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto: Sermon de Saint Francis aos 
pássaros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto: Sermon del San Francis agli uccelli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giotto: Κήρυγμα Αγίου Francis στα πουλιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto: Sermón de Santo Francis a los 
pájaros</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Giotto: Szent Ferenc prédikációja a madaraknak, 1295 k. Assisi, San Francesco, felső templom, hosszház, freskó.</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto: Saint Francis's sermon to the birds, about 1295. Assisi, San Francesco, upper church, lenght house. fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Assisi,  Szent Ferenc,  Ferences-rend,  freskó,  13. század,  </string>
            <string language="en">Assisi,  Saint Francis,  Franciscian Order,  fresco,  13th century,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto: Heiliger Franciss Predigt zu den 
Vögeln, ungefähr 1295. Assisi, San Francesco, obere Kirche, 
lenght Hausfresko.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto : Sermon de Saint Francis aux 
oiseaux, environ 1295. Assisi, San Francesco, église 
supérieure, fresque de maison de lenght.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto: Sermon aos pássaros, 
aproximadamente 1295 de Saint Francis. Assisi, San Francesco, 
igreja superior, fresco da casa do lenght.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto: Sermon agli uccelli, circa 1295 del 
San Francis. Assisi, San Francesco, chiesa superiore, fresco 
della casa del lenght.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giotto: Κήρυγμα Αγίου Francis στα πουλιά, 
περίπου 1295, Assisi, SAN Francesco, ανώτερη εκκλησία, 
lenght νωπογραφία σπιτιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto: Sermón a los pájaros, cerca de 1295
de Santo Francis. Assisi, San Francesco, iglesia superior, casa 
del lenght. fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Assisi, Heiliger Francis, Franciscian Ordnung, Fresko, 13. 
Jahrhundert,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Assisi, Saint Francis, commande de Franciscian, fresque, 13ème 
siècle,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Assisi, Saint Francis, ordem de Franciscian, fresco, 1ó 
século,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assisi, San Francis, ordine di Franciscian, fresco, tredicesimo 
secolo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Assisi, Αγιος Francis, Franciscian κατάταξη, 
νωπογραφία, 13$ος αιώνας,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Assisi, Santo Francis, orden de Franciscian, fresco, 
décimotercero siglo,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
